name: Step by Step (itch) (Sofox)
description:
You are lost in a cave. It is pitch black.

You can't see a thing, but you can hear your footsteps echo

You'll have to find your way out......

Step by Step

A Game by Sofox for Trijam #167

Arrow keys and/or WASD to move

Development streamed live on Twitch at https://www.twitch.tv/sofox

Used audio:

https://freesound.org/people/patchytherat/sounds/535052/

https://freesound.org/people/RokZRooM/sounds/509590/
